testcase.name: Free CRM Test create a new Deal Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Pages........................................passed When title of Login Page is Free CRMs.......................................passed Then users enters username and password.....................................passed Then user clicks on Login Buttons...........................................passed Then user is on Home Pages..................................................passed Then user mouse over on deals...............................................passed Then user click on new deal links...........................................passed Then user enters new deals details..........................................passed Then user click on save buttons.............................................passed Then close the browsers.....................................................passed
